segment.source: The MED-V solution comprises the following elements:
segment.target: The MED-V solution comprises the following elements:

segment.source: Administrator-defined virtual machine—Encapsulates a full desktop environment, including an operating system, applications, and optional management and security tools.
segment.target: Administrator-defined virtual machine—Encapsulates a full desktop environment, including an operating system, applications, and optional management and security tools.

segment.source: Image repository—Stores all virtual images on a standard IIS server and enables virtual images version management, client-authenticated image retrieval, and efficient download (of a new image or updates) via Trim Transfer technology.
segment.target: Image repository—Stores all virtual images on a standard IIS server and enables virtual images version management, client-authenticated image retrieval, and efficient download (of a new image or updates) via Trim Transfer technology.

segment.source: Management server—Associates virtual images from the image repository along with administrator usage policies to Active Directory® users or groups.
segment.target: Management server—Associates virtual images from the image repository along with administrator usage policies to Active Directory® users or groups.

segment.source: The management server also aggregates clients' events and stores them in an external database (Microsoft SQL Server®) for monitoring and reporting purposes.
segment.target: The management server also aggregates clients' events and stores them in an external database (Microsoft SQL Server®) for monitoring and reporting purposes.

segment.source: Management console—Enables administrators to control the management server and the image repository.
segment.target: Management console—Enables administrators to control the management server and the image repository.

segment.source: Virtual image life-cycle—Authentication, image retrieval, enforcement of usage policies.
segment.target: Virtual image life-cycle—Authentication, image retrieval, enforcement of usage policies.

segment.source: Virtual machine session management—Start, stop, lock the virtual machine.
segment.target: Virtual machine session management—Start, stop, lock the virtual machine.

segment.source: Single desktop experience—Applications installed in the virtual machine seamlessly available through the standard desktop Start menu and integrated with other applications on the user desktop.
segment.target: Single desktop experience—Applications installed in the virtual machine seamlessly available through the standard desktop Start menu and integrated with other applications on the user desktop.

segment.source: All communication between the client and the servers (management server and image repository) is carried on top of a standard HTTP or HTTPS channel.
segment.target: All communication between the client and the servers (management server and image repository) is carried on top of a standard HTTP or HTTPS channel.
